dishes.reason_for_strategy: Although a specific 'La Madeleine Caesar Salad' FDC ID was not found, multiple highly relevant branded 'CAESAR SALAD' entries are available. These branded entries are likely to provide a more accurate and stable nutritional profile for a common prepared dish like Caesar salad than attempting to sum individual ingredients, especially given the challenges in finding precise FDC IDs for all individual ingredients.
dishes.usda_source_description: CAESAR SALAD (Type: Branded, Brand: Taylor Fresh Foods, Inc.)
dishes.reason_for_choice: Selected FDC ID 1916135 as it is a highly relevant branded 'CAESAR SALAD' with a high score. Its ingredient list (Romaine lettuce, Caesar dressing, Parmesan cheese, croutons implied by typical Caesar salad composition) closely matches the components identified in Phase 1, offering a comprehensive dish-level nutritional profile. This is preferred over an ingredient-level approach due to the availability of a good dish-level match and the common, standardized nature of Caesar salad.
